TopicTitle: How do i check my rockets stats in ksp

Articles.Content: I know this may sound like a stupid question but i have been watching some basic tutorials on ksp and i would just like to know how to find out things like the thrust to weigh ratio of my finished rocket

Moved to Gameplay Questions.

You can either calculate TWR by hand using this formula: TWR = Thrust / (RocketMass * LocalGravity) or use a mod like Kerbal Engineer Redux or MechJeb to calculate it for you.
